body.name: Westinghouse 24" HD Smart Roku TV, 720p High Definition Smart TV with Wi-Fi Connectivity and Mobile App, Flat Screen TV Compatible with Apple Home Kit, Alexa and Google Assistant (2022 Model)
features: High-Definition Display - Optimized for an unmatched entertainment experience. Our 24 inch Smart TV brings you clear, crisp visuals with 720 pixel resolution. It reduces motion blur and sharpens images for seamless flat screen streaming.

Smart Command Connectivity - This 24 inch Roku TV takes Smart TVs to the next level with its dual-band Wi-Fi access and Smart Home compatibility. Access top streaming services through voice command with your Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant-enabled, and Apple HomeKit devices.

Say “Adios'' to Subtitles - Watch your favorite TV show in your preferred language without subtitles. Opt to turn on or off the “closed-captioning” feature for convenient viewing. Our Roku Smart TV is is multilingual-ready to easily customize your On-Screen-Display.

Cast Your Content & Entertainment - Sync videos, music, or photos from your device to your TV using the Roku Mobile App or Apple AirPlay2. It’s easy to set up, so you can switch to your gaming console, connect your antenna, or discover new shows all through your Westinghouse TV home screen!

Private Listening - Listen without limits using the Private Listening feature of our Roku TVs. Simply connect your headphones or earbuds to your mobile device before turning on the feature on your Roku Mobile App!
body.description: Unequaled entertainment experience that fits your lifestyle High Definition (HD) Enjoy your entertainment with reduced motion-blur and a crisp picture. Smart Home Technology Compatible with your Apple AirPlay, Apple HomeKit, Amazon Alexa, and Google Assistant-enabled devices. Voice Search & Control Get to your entertainment even faster and voice control your streaming on the free Roku Mobile App! Cast Your Content and Entertainment Share your videos, music, or photos from your device to your TV using your free Roku Mobile App or Apple AirPlay 2. Private Listening Connect your headphones or earbuds to your free Roku Mobile App and listen as loud as you want without disturbing others! Dolby Audio Provides crystal-clear audio with improved dialogue and enhanced loudness for a fuller audio mix. All your entertainment in one place! Simple set-up & interface allows you to stream your favorite show, connect your antenna, switch to your game console or discover new things to watchâall from the Roku home screen. Easy Setup With an easy guided setup, itâs simple to start streaming or watch TV with cable, satellite, or HDTV antenna. Â Â

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kitchen TV
reviews.reviewText: The wifi & apps make this TV a great bargain smaller TV. Nice picture and good sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roku 5.99 now to subscribe :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for a small TV
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I needed a small TV and this is perfect!After purchasing this I looked at more reviews and was worried the sound wouldn't be good.But luckily I'm not disappointed!!It was so easy to set-up. I'm very satisfied with the picture and sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I liked it all around
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for a TV. Also, the smaller one comes in good packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a regular tv
reviews.reviewText: Having to get use to a tv that doesn’t have a remote with a number pad for direct tuning. Is a fine tv just more adapted to streaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture is crisp on this smart TV and it was super easy to set up. I haven’t figured out how to install SLING tv but other than that it is well worth the price on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Sound is Terrible!
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would be easier to use Roku since it was loaded on the TV because we needed two remotes to make our original kitchen TV work. It was easy to use, but the sound was so tinny that it was unbearable to listen to. I returned it and we went back to the other TV and two remotes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great
reviews.reviewText: Nice for the price, used in bedroom.
